I had high hopes for this scrub after seeing all the positive reviews and even sized up due to the bust always being a problem area for scrubs. Even after sizing up, I could barely get it to fit across the chest. I felt like I was wearing a flour sack instead of a shirt as it has zero stretch and had no seams that curve with a woman's body. I had to look at the tag to make sure it was not a unisex scrub. I had to keep tugging it down to make it sit where it should. This top is also very stiff and doesn't breathe well. I hoped that after a couple of washes that it would get better but it still is the same. It was past the return window and decided to use the top as a house cleaning shirt since it is too uncomfortable to wear for work. This is a popular scrub brand and sadly Wal-Mart does a better job of making scrubs then this company.

Just as I mention before on the other Item, not enough stretch and the sleeves are not long enough for me.  I like coverage in the top to be just a few inches up in the fold of the elbow. I work at a Veterinary Clinic, constantly moving, picking up animals, and being covered in hair. But I love it!!! I ordered one of these in my prime wardrobe and it was the only one that fit and was comfortable!!! I don't know why scrub sizing is so off. I have a blue scrub thats and XL and its soooooo tight I can't even get it over my boobs. But these fit amazing. I like mine a little loose so if you're 5'7", 38DDD, and size 14-16 pants you could probably fit into a large. They're soft breathable and stretchy. Not by a lot but enough to wear I'm not being squeezed if I have to bend over to grab a pet. They wash really nice too. I hang dry in fear of shrinkage. Now to just find some damn scrub pants that fit nice as well.

I absolutely love these scrubs! They have just enough stretch without becoming overly baggy. They last many years with being washed regularly.  Stains come out with no effort. The only reason I've had to retire a pair of my scrubs is that the thighs wore  thin from my thighs rubbing.  That was after 6 years of wearing the same scrubs. The price for a full set is very affordable.
